confirmDeleteNote: Are you sure you want to delete this note?
confirmDataSharing: Are you sure you want to share the requested data?
dataSharingMessage: Enter a message for the healthcare provider (optional):
backupReminder: Remember: Keep your recovery key safe. You'll need it to restore from a backup if you get locked out of your account.
noArticlesAvailable: No articles available at the moment.
usernamePasswordRequirements: Username must be at least 4 characters and password at least 12 characters.
appDescription: This app works only on this computer and this web browser. It's like a digital notebook that only you can see.
infoSavedLocally: Your information is only saved on this computer. It's not shared with anyone else.
useSameBrowser: Always use the same web browser (like Chrome, Firefox, or Safari) to open this app.
forgotPasswordInfo: If you forget your password, you'll need a special code to get your information back.
saveRegularly: It's a good idea to save your information regularly, just in case.
keepCodeSafe: Write down this code and keep it somewhere safe, like in a drawer at home. You'll need it if you ever forget your password.
alwaysUseSameBrowser: Always use the same web browser to open this app.
regularlyBackup: Regularly save your information using the "Save" or "Backup" button you'll see when you use the app.
createNewAccount: You'll need to create a new account
useRecoveryCode: Then, use your special recovery code to get your old information back
needLastBackup: You'll also need the last save or "backup" you made
keepInfoSafe: Remember, keeping your password and recovery code safe is very important. Don't share them with anyone.
readyToStart: I've Read This and I'm Ready to Start
browserNotSupportDirectorySelection: Your browser does not support selecting directories. Backups will be downloaded manually.
backupDirectorySelected: Backup directory selected successfully. Automatic backups will be saved here.
failedToSelectBackupDirectoryAlert: Failed to select backup directory. Please try again.
recoveryKeyNotFound: Recovery key not found. Unable to create backup.
backupSavedToDirectory: Backup saved successfully to selected directory
failedToSaveBackupToDirectory: Failed to save backup to selected directory:
failedToReadBackupFile: Failed to read the backup file
backupCreationFailure: Failed to create backup. Please try again.
selectBackupDirectoryPrompt: Please select a directory for automatic backups in the settings.
selectBothDates: Please select both start and end dates.
selectAtLeastOneDataType: Please select at least one data type to export.
errorExportingDataAlert: An error occurred while exporting data. Please try again.

errorMessages.loginFailed: Login failed. Please check your credentials and try again.
errorMessages.accountCreationFailed: Failed to create account. Please try again.
errorMessages.personalInfoSaveFailed: Failed to save personal information. Please try again.
errorMessages.noteAddFailed: Failed to add note. Please try again.
errorMessages.noteEditFailed: Failed to edit note. Please try again.
errorMessages.noteDeleteFailed: Failed to delete note. Please try again.
errorMessages.healthDataSaveFailed: Failed to save health data. Please try again.
errorMessages.dataExportFailed: Failed to export data. Please try again.
errorMessages.backupFailed: Failed to create backup. Please try again.
errorMessages.restoreFailed: Failed to restore from backup. Please check your recovery key and try again.
errorMessages.requestActionFailed: Failed to process request. Please try again.
errorMessages.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection and try again.

tutorialLoginContent: Let's start by logging in. Enter your username and password, then click 'Login'.
tutorialCreateAccountContent: If you don't have an account, click 'Create one' to set up a new account.
tutorialArticlesOverviewContent: This tab shows the latest articles relevant to your health. Stay informed about recent developments and health tips.
tutorialReadingArticlesContent: Click 'Read more' on any article to view its full content. This helps you stay up-to-date with health information.
tutorialPersonalInfoContent: Here you can view and update your personal details such as name, age, height, and gender.
tutorialSavingInfoContent: After making changes, don't forget to click 'Save Personal Info' to update your records.
tutorialSecureNotesContent: This section allows you to keep private notes about your health, appointments, or any other information you want to remember.
tutorialAddingNoteContent: Click 'Add New Note' to create a new entry. Your notes are securely stored and only visible to you.
tutorialHealthTrackerContent: Log your daily health metrics here, such as water intake, colostomy output, and pain levels.
tutorialHealthChartContent: This chart shows trends in your health data over time. It's a great way to spot patterns or changes in your health.
tutorialHealthHistoryContent: Review your past health entries here. You can edit previous entries if needed.
tutorialDoctorRequestsContent: This tab shows requests from doctors to access your health data. You can review each request here.
tutorialManageRequestsContent: For each request, you can choose to accept or decline. Always make sure you trust the requesting doctor before sharing your data.
tutorialSettingsOverviewContent: Manage your account settings, data backups, and exports here.
tutorialBackupRecoveryContent: Regularly backing up your data is important. Set up automatic backups or create a manual backup here.
tutorialDataExportContent: You can export your health data as an Excel file. This is useful for personal records or sharing with healthcare providers.
